title: Add multi-platform shopping product index and search

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store product information including name, price, description, image URL, category, platform source (Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, or other), and product URL
acceptanceCriteria: Product type includes all necessary fields for shopping product display
Platform source is captured as a text field or enum
Data structure supports multiple products from different platforms

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to add products from Amazon to the product index
acceptanceCriteria: Function accepts product details and stores them with Amazon as the platform source
Products can be retrieved by platform filter

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to add products from Flipkart to the product index
acceptanceCriteria: Function accepts product details and stores them with Flipkart as the platform source
Products can be retrieved by platform filter

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to add products from Meesho to the product index
acceptanceCriteria: Function accepts product details and stores them with Meesho as the platform source
Products can be retrieved by platform filter

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to add products from BlinkIt to the product index
acceptanceCriteria: Function accepts product details and stores them with BlinkIt as the platform source
Products can be retrieved by platform filter

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to add products from other shopping platforms to the product index
acceptanceCriteria: Function accepts product details with a custom platform name
Products can be retrieved by platform filter

requirements.text: Implement backend search functionality to query products across all indexed platforms by name, category, or platform filter
acceptanceCriteria: Search returns products matching search terms from all platforms
Results can be filtered by specific platform
Search is case-insensitive

requirements.text: Create a Products page in the frontend that displays the indexed products from all shopping platforms in a grid layout with product cards showing image, name, price, platform badge, and a link to the original product
acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed in a responsive grid
Each product card shows all required information
Platform source is visually indicated with a badge or label
Product links open in a new tab to the original platform

requirements.text: Add a search bar component to the Products page that allows users to search products by name or filter by platform
acceptanceCriteria: Search input updates product display in real-time or on submit
Platform filter options include Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, and All Platforms
Search integrates with backend search functionality

requirements.text: Update the navigation header to include a Products link that navigates to the new Products page
acceptanceCriteria: Products link is added to Header component navigation
Link uses smooth scroll or routing to Products section/page
Active state is indicated when on Products page

requirements.text: Update the Hero section headline and subheadline to reflect the shopping product index functionality across Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, and other platforms
acceptanceCriteria: Headline communicates the multi-platform shopping index purpose
Subheadline mentions the included platforms
Text maintains the warm, professional tone of the existing design

constraints: Maintain single-actor Motoko architecture in backend/main.mo
Preserve existing warm earth-tone design system and visual style
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
Use React, Tailwind CSS, and React Query for frontend implementation
nonGoals: Automated web scraping or real-time product data fetching from external platforms

Flipkart logo icon for platform badge (flipkart-logo.dim_64x64.png)
Meesho logo icon for platform badge (meesho-logo.dim_64x64.png)
BlinkIt logo icon for platform badge (blinkit-logo.dim_64x64.png)
Generic shopping bag icon for other platforms (generic-shop.dim_64x64.png)
Search icon illustration for the product search feature (search-icon.dim_128x128.png)
